Ivory Tower Wizard Janssen:
The pieces cannot be pulled out from the bodies of magical creatures.
We don't know how to put them back, so it would be best simply to destroy.
Who and why put the Pieces inside the magical creatures we don't know, but something needs to be done.
The destruction of the Shards - the best solution. I must protect this place, so You have to find the right equipment and destroy the Shards.
